content: this is a summary of a legal case that was heard in the municipal court pazin the case is related to article 54 of the property act the procedure has been ongoing for an unspecified period of time the document provides a general overview of the progress of the case without giving specific details or outcome it states that a coownership property dispute has been resolved and the plaintiff has been ordered to pay a specific amount to the first and second defendants within 15 days once the payment is made the defendants mortgage rights will be transferred to the plaintiff the decision is based on the property act and previous court rulings the court has determined the coownership shares and assessed the value of the property ownership has been awarded to the plaintiff based on their use and investment in the property as well as the statutory provisions and specific circumstances of the case
